attributes.action: Remove the UK 14 day Quarantine rule & replace with COVID19 testing at airports.
attributes.additional_details: Allowing overseas travel to recommence will prevent tens of thousands of travel professionals losing their jobs. The public have a fundamental right to take a holiday. Infection rates are lower in many tourist destinations than the UK and all necessary safety measures have been put in place to make it safe to travel. Quarantine restrictions have gradually closed down nearly all winter holiday destinations and the travel industry is unable survive without the ability to trade.
attributes.background:
We call for the government to remove the economically damaging 14 day Quarantine rule & replace with testing at airports allowing overseas travel to recommence.
An effective testing programme would be a huge step forward and is what the industry needs to survive.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Do not enforce a compulsory quarantine on people arriving in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320329

Mandatory COVID tests at airports/ports for departing and arriving travellers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551550
